content: Oh, that was fast! Mmph? Looks like the <style=Highlight>Glowspire Round Table</style>, <style=Highlight>potted plant</style>, and <style=Highlight>Golden Daikabutomaru Statue</style> aren't quite finished yet... No worries, I'll wait! I don't mind waiting, even if it takes forrrreveer!
info: NPC装修任务 - 伊佐奇 - 未完成家具_伊佐奇
